pageProduct.name: Reef Coconut Oil 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

About Reef Oils

Originally launched in the 1970's, Reef is one of Australia's most iconic sun care brands, known for its famous coconut scented oils and carefree, fun nature. Reef now offers a range of suncare products infused with our signature coconut scent, from Sun Tan Oils, Sunscreen Oils to Sunscreen Lotions!

Reef Oil Range

Reef is Australia's leading* sunscreen oil brand.

Reef complies with the Hawaii Reef Bill to help care for our coral reefs.

Reef is proudly Australian made for the Australian Sun.

Scented with the smell of summer - Reef's delicious signature coconut fragrance.

Now with a range of HIGH SPF PRODUCTS.

The ultra-moisturising oil formulations glide on, are fast drying, and absorb quickly, leaving skin feeling hydrated, soft and supple.

The entire Reef range is formulated to be free from oxybenzone and other ingredients excluded under the current Hawaii Reef Bill.

All Reef products are formulated using cruelty free ingredients.

*Australia Grocery Pharmacy Dollars (000s) MAT 04/07/21

General Information

Reef Dark Sun Tan Oil Professional Strength Coconut helps promote the deepest, richest tan possible when in the sun, while the natural oils add moisturising life to your skin.

Size: 125mL

Scent: Coconut

Warnings

This Reef Oil offers no protection against UV rays.

Ingredients

Mineral Oil, Coconut Oil, Octyl methoxycinnamate, Cocoa Butter, Almond Oil, Palm Oil, Fragrance, Sesame Oil, Acetylated Lanolin Alcohol, BHT.

Directions

Shake well before use.
Apply liberally and evenly to all areas. Re-apply as necessary. if rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes.

USAGE ADVICE

Sun Safety: Avoid prolonged exposure to the sun. Always wear a hat, protective clothing and sunglasses. The use of very high protection sunscreen is recommended. Never expose babies under six months to the sun.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
